feed.title: Jellystat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: 1.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update to main by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/71
  • Merge from main to unstable by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/79
  • sql injection is openbar by @LaSylv in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/100
  • bring in new changes to unstable by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/105
  • Display the subtitle stream for a given session by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/108
  • Bugfix/variables casing by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/109
  • Show sessions ETA by @foux in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/112
  • Update docker-image.yml by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/114
  • Update docker-image.yml by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/113
  • add links to last-watched-card by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/120
  • Feature/geolocate ip by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/123
  • fix NaN for live tv playback by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/125
  • Vite by @c4lyp5o in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/124
  • Feature/geolocate ip by @DaftFuzz in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/126
  • Sync optimizations by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/127
  • Merge Unstable to Main 1.0.8 -> 1.0.9 by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/134

New Contributors

  • @DaftFuzz made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/108
  • @foux made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/112
  • @c4lyp5o made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.0.8...1.0.9

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: 1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Playback tracking rework #56 #116
  • Fix Stretched Music Album Covers by @simoncaron in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/135
  • Hotfix for session API error by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/139
  • [Feature] Implement DNS Caching of HTTP Queries by @simoncaron in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/144
  • Add the use of volumes to the example docker compose configuration by @gardner in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/146
  • Docker Secrets by @ThorpeJosh in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/156
  • fix: add quotes to postgres user in migrations by @Intuinewin in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/159
  • Use POSTGRES_DATABASE environment variable by @jsmouret in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/160
  • Fix: Display apple icon correctly for iOS Devices by @ncabete in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/187
  • Update realibility of ci and docker-compose by @Gauvino in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/193
  • French translation by @EVOTk in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/202
  • Update fr-FR translation.json by @EVOTk in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/205
  • rework to make tracking more accurate based on lastPausedDate field a04f7c4
  • fix for 207 ui not updating on task interval change abf7f45

New Contributors

  • @simoncaron made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/135
  • @gardner made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/146
  • @ThorpeJosh made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/156
  • @Intuinewin made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/159
  • @jsmouret made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/160
  • @ncabete made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/187
  • @Gauvino made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/193
  • @EVOTk made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/202

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.0.9...1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: 1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 1.1.0 Release by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/212
  • Sync with main by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/214
  • rebase with main by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/217
  • Adding healthcheck to docker image by @zodac in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/220
  • Translation patch fr-FR by @EVOTk in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/239
  • Allow overriding owner of tables during migrations by @halkeye in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/250
  • Expanded Global Users stats
  • Added user preferences per session
  • better error handling in api
  • Base URL added
  • Updated Translations
  • Fix multiple 1 second recordings in activity
  • Added Stream Type filters and Filters by Library
  • Added Concurrent Stream stats

Fixes * #214 * #217 * #223 * #231 * #235 * #234 * #229 * #240 * #118 * #248 * #254 * #257 * #256 * #258 * #263 * #267

New Contributors

  • @zodac made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/220
  • @halkeye made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/250

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.1.0...1.1.1

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: 1.1.2 Release
entry.content:
This is the first of the new releases that will follow a different release cycle as compared to previous releases. Each release will be lighter overall to ensure fixes are deployed much faster to the stable branch

Whats New: Added environment variable to define the minimum number of seconds for a playback to be included - @zodac Added zh-CN Language - @zjjxwhh Added External URL option

Fixes Fixed Backup endpoints not working Fixed Device icons not showing for Emby Fixed filtering by stream type for Emby Fix for IS_JELLYFIN flag looking at the wrong section in the config fix for https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/issues/263 , default value for no activity on fs_user_stats
